src:
Gj√∏r endringer i Diamond League. Slik reagerer Gjert Ingebrigtsen
Arrang√∏ren av Diamond League-serien i friidrett offentliggjorde onsdag de 12 utvalgte √∏velsene for neste √•r.
06 Nov 2019, 21:12 by Lars S√∏rnes
Det har v√¶rt kjent en stund at 5000 meter var p√• vei ut, men n√• er det endelig bekreftet.
Sjefen i Team Ingebrigtsen, Gjert, er ikke nevneverdig bekymret for at √∏velsen er utelatt fra Diamond league-programmet.
‚Äì For guttene sin del har det ingen betydning. Det er fordelen med √• strekke seg over flere distanser. Man blir ikke s√•bare for slike endringer, sier Gjert Ingebrigtsen.


‚Äì Det er ingen misn√∏ye med at 5000-meteren fjernes?


‚Äì Overhodet ikke.

Jakob Ingebrigtsen kjemper mot verdens beste om √• bli √•rets unge ut√∏ver

Gjennomf√∏res raskere
Jakob Ingebrigtsen l√∏p inn til femteplass p√• distansen under Friidretts-VM i Doha tidligere i h√∏st. Ogs√• Filip og Henrik l√∏p finalen ‚Äì f√∏rstnevnte m√•tte bryte, mens eldstemann havnet et stykke bak p√• 13.-plass.
Signalene tyder imidlertid p√• at det kommer til √• bli arrangert flere 5000-metere under stevnene, men distansen blir ikke en del av Diamond League-programmet.
Neste √•r blir det if√∏lge Diamond Leagues nettsted 14 innledende stevner og en finale.
Allerede tidligere i √•r ble det vedtatt √• begrense antall √∏velser p√• DL-programmet til 12 for hvert kj√∏nn. Tanken er at stevnene skal gjennomf√∏res raskere.

Filip Ingebrigtsen skal bli far for f√∏rste gang



B√•de Filip, Jakob og Henrik Ingebrigsten kom seg til 5000 meter-finalen under VM i Doha tidligere i h√∏st.üì∑ Nick Didlick / AP

Etter en markedsunders√∏kelse konkluderte arrang√∏ren med at de mest popul√¶re √∏velsene er 100 meter, lengde, h√∏yde, stav, 200 meter og 400 meter. Likevel kuttes 200 meter fra programmet, fordi man velger √• prioritere 100 meter, skriver NTB.
Tre andre √∏velser fjernes fordi de scoret lavt i popularitet. Det er diskos, tresteg og 3000 meter hinder.

Fakta: Dette er Diamond League-√∏velsene i 2020
100 meter
400 meter
800 meter
1500 meter
3000 meter
100/110 meter hekk
400 meter hekk
Lengde
H√∏yde
Stav
Spyd
Kule

Utstillingsvindu
‚Äì M√•let v√•rt er √• skape en hurtigere, mer spennende global liga som utstillingsvindu for sporten v√•r, en liga TV-selskapene √∏nsker √• vise og tilhengerne √∏nsker √• se p√•. Samtidig forst√•r vi skuffelsen til ut√∏verne av √∏velser som ikke blir del av Diamond League-sesongen i 2020, sier IAAF-president og Diamond League-formann Sebastian Coe.
√òvelser som ikke n√•dde opp p√• Diamond League-programmet vil i stedet komme med i den nye Kontinentaltouren, en serie stevner p√• niv√•et under Diamond League som skal innf√∏res neste √•r.

Jakob Ingebrigtsen kom for sent til start - knuste likevel storebroren og satte norgesrekord

Steinar Hoen jobber med √• sy sammen det endelige stevneprogrammet til kommende sesongs Bislett Games, som ogs√• blir et Diamond League-stevne i 2020.
‚Äì Alle de ¬´norske √∏velsene¬ª er med. Karoline Bjerkeli Gr√∏vdal har sagt at hun skal l√∏pe 3000 meter og ikke 3000 meter hinder neste sesong. Alle de norske √∏velsene er ogs√• med under neste sesongs Bislett Games, men det er ikke 100 prosent bestemt hvilke av dem som er med i 90-minuttersprogrammet og hvem som m√• v√¶re med i halvtimen f√∏r selve Diamond League-stevnet starter. Det blir endelig avgjort kommende onsdag, sier Bislett Games-sjef Steinar Hoen til NTB.
(100% Sport / @NTB)
text:
Make changes to the Diamond League. This is how Gjert Ingebrigtsen responds
The organizer of the Diamond League series in athletics on Wednesday announced the 12 selected exercises for next year.
06 Nov 2019, 21:12 by Lars S√∏rnes
It has been known for a while that 5000 meters was on the way out, but now it is finally confirmed.
The head of Team Ingebrigtsen, Gjert, is not particularly concerned about the practice being left out of the Diamond league program.
- For the boys, it doesn't matter. There is the advantage of extending over several distances. You do not get hurt for such changes, says Gjert Ingebrigtsen.


- There is no dissatisfaction with removing the 5000 meter?


- Absolutely not.

Jakob Ingebrigtsen is fighting for the world's best to be this year's young performer

Implemented faster
Jakob Ingebrigtsen finished fifth in the distance during the Athletics World Championships in Doha earlier this fall. Filip and Henrik also ran the final - the former had to break, while the elder ended up a bit behind in 13th place.
The signals suggest, however, that there will be more 5000 meters under the rallies, but the distance will not be part of the Diamond League program.
Next year, according to Diamond Leagues website, there will be 14 introductory events and a final.
Already earlier this year, it was decided to limit the number of exercises on the DL program to 12 for each gender. The idea is that the events will be conducted more quickly.

Filip Ingebrigtsen will be the father for the first time



Both Filip, Jakob and Henrik Ingebrigsten reached the 5000 meter final during the Doha World Cup earlier this fall.üì∑ Nick Didlick / AP

According to a market survey, the organizer concluded that the most popular exercises are 100 meters, length, height, rod, 200 meters and 400 meters. Nevertheless, 200 meters are cut from the program, because one chooses to prioritize 100 meters, writes NTB.
Three other drills are removed because they scored low in popularity. There are discos, wooden steps and 3000 meters of obstacles.

Fact: These are the 2020 Diamond League drills
100 meters
400 meters
800 meters
1500 meters
3000 meters
100/110 meter hedge
400 meters hedge
Length
Height
Bar
Spear
cool

showcasing
- Our goal is to create a faster, more exciting global league as a showcase for our sport, a league the TV companies want to show and fans want to watch. At the same time, we understand the disappointment of the practitioners with exercises that will not be part of the Diamond League season in 2020, says IAAF President and Diamond League Chairman Sebastian Coe.
Exercises that did not reach the Diamond League program will instead be included in the new Continental Tour, a series of events at the Diamond League level to be introduced next year.

Jakob Ingebrigtsen got too late to start - still broke his big brother and set a Norwegian record

Steinar Hoen is working on stitching together the final staging program for the upcoming season's Bislett Games, which will also be a Diamond League event in 2020.
- All the "Norwegian exercises" are included. Karoline Bjerkeli Gr√∏vdal has said that she will run 3000 meters and not 3000 meters obstacle next season. All of the Norwegian drills are also participating in the next season's Bislett Games, but it is not 100 percent decided which of them will be in the 90-minute program and who must be in the half hour before the Diamond League event itself starts. It will finally be decided next Wednesday, says Bislett Games CEO Steinar Hoen to NTB.
(100% Sports / @NTB)
